ara_information.name: ARA Institute of Canterbury
ara_information.description: ARA provides a wide range of programs, including foundation studies, certificates, diplomas, degrees, and graduate diplomas.

streets.name: High St
streets.details: starts on the corner of madras st and st asaph st

streets.name: Southwark St
streets.details: south of st asaph st, starts at madras st

streets.name: Allen St
streets.details: south of Southwark St, starts at madras st

streets.name: Ferry Rd
streets.details: starts half way down st asaph st to barbadoes st

streets.name: Coventry St
streets.details: short street starting on barbodoes st and turns at 90 degress into willliams st

streets.name: Williams St
streets.details: short street starting on ferry road and turns at 90 degress into Coventry St

buildings.label: PX
buildings.name: Hairdressing
buildings.location: northwest corner on High St and Tuam St

buildings.label: JZ
buildings.name: Music Arts
buildings.location: northwest corner, below PX on High St and Madras St
buildings.description: The specialised building for music programs, including performance spaces, practice rooms, and recording studios for jazz and other music disciplines.

buildings.label: P
buildings.name: Plains FM
buildings.location: northwest of buildings S & N on Madras st, off the corner of St Asaph st
buildings.description: home of broadcasting school and the plains fm radio station along with the student radio station

buildings.label: T
buildings.location: next to G and U buildings, east of main courtyard
buildings.description: IT and printing services

buildings.label: OH
buildings.location: north-central over St Asaph st on the corner of Madrass and st Asaph st
buildings.description: on site accommodation for students

buildings.label: OEDT
buildings.location: north-central next to OH
buildings.description: on site accommodation for students

buildings.label: U
buildings.location: northeast of main courtyard, near Ferry Rd
buildings.description: contains cafe run by students and staff of rhe cullenery school also located in the same building

buildings.label: S
buildings.name: S & N block
buildings.location: central, southwest of building U,west of main courtyard, near Madras St above N building
buildings.description: Computing department building and health sciences, 7 story building, shares elivators and cener of building with N building

buildings.label: N
buildings.name: S & N block
buildings.location: west of main courtyard, near Madras St, above X building and attached to S building
buildings.description: Home to the business, building and nursing departments, 7 story building

buildings.label: D
buildings.name: Design Block
buildings.location: Above moorhouse ave on madras st
buildings.description: Home to the creative arts programs, including graphic design, fashion, and visual arts. It contains studios, workshops, 4 story building

buildings.label: L
buildings.name: Library
buildings.location: apart of the Rakaia center, below the main courtyard east of X building
buildings.description: The main campus library, offering a variety of resources, study spaces, and support services for students. contains disability services, 2 story building

buildings.label: X
buildings.name: Student Support
buildings.location: apart of the Rakaia center, east of madras st main carpark, below N building
buildings.description: dedicated computer labs and has student services on the ground floor. It also houses classrooms for the Adult English program. 3 stroy building which also contains the elivators for the Rakaia center

buildings.label: A
buildings.name: Administration
buildings.location: apart of the Rakaia center, below L block above C block, west of CH building
buildings.description: The main administrative building

buildings.label: G
buildings.location: on williams st, below and atached to T building east-central, above TM
buildings.description: the rest of the administration

buildings.label: TM
buildings.name: Te Puna Wānaka
buildings.location: east-central, above CH
buildings.description: The centre for Māori, Pacific, and indigenous studies.

buildings.label: CH
buildings.name: Child care center
buildings.location: east-central, above W and E buildings
buildings.description: early childhood center so you can easily drop your kids here while you study

buildings.label: W
buildings.name: Whareora
buildings.location: southeast, large building above Moorhouse Ave and barbadose st, car park below and north east
buildings.description: contains a gym, a sports court, doctors and some classrooms, is a 2 story building

buildings.label: K
buildings.location: southeast, large building north of Moorhouse Ave and west of barbadose st, car park below and north east
buildings.description: contains a gym, a sports court, doctors and some classrooms, is a 2 story building

buildings.label: E
buildings.name: NASDA
buildings.location: above K building and west of W building which it shares an entrace with
buildings.description: Houses the National Academy of Singing and Dramatic Arts, is a 2 story building

buildings.label: C
buildings.location: south-central, above D and DL, on Madras st
buildings.description: Houses the fashion department and also is the student space, good dry place to have lunch, often activities at the stat of term, 2 story building.

buildings.label: DL
buildings.name: Madras
buildings.location: southwest on Madras st above D building
buildings.description: A large, dedicated lecture hall next to the D building, primarily used for lectures and presentations related to the design and creative arts programs.

buildings.name: Rakaia center
buildings.description: An interconnected atrium that combines L, A and X buildings into one space, it is a central hub for student services, including enrollment services, finance, academic support, an information desk, counseling and a cafe

buildings.name: main courtyard
buildings.location: surrounded by N S U T G L and X buildings
buildings.description: A nice grass area, with seating and trees

parking_areas.name: Madras st main carpark
parking_areas.location: west-central, between Madras St and X building, north of C building, south of N building
parking_areas.details: limited guest parking and drop off area

parking_areas.name: Allen St Parking
parking_areas.location: East, large lot on Allen St

parking_areas.name: Main student parking
parking_areas.location: southeast, on the corner of barbadoes st and moornouse ave, surounds W bouiding along Barbadoes st past CH and TM buildings

parking_areas.name: Madras
parking_areas.location: southeast, along Barbadoes St near W
